title: remove csv export
description: We will only export to json. This reduces conflict of having two copies of the same exported data.

title: External issue sync
description: Import and sync issues from external repositories (GitHub, GitLab, etc). Support importing issues, marking them complete locally with comments, and syncing back to remote.

title: Setup gh CLI for external sync
description: Blocker for feature #3 (External issue sync). Use GitHub CLI (gh) for importing and syncing GitHub issues. Add installation help: detect if gh is installed, provide clear error message with installation instructions (brew install gh, or https://cli.github.com) if not found.

title: Add issue linking/dependencies
description: Add support for linking issues together (blocks, depends_on, related_to). This will help track issue dependencies like issue #5 blocking feature #3.
